alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:37AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fayette County through 415 AM CDT... At 336 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tripoli to near Mount Auburn. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Oelwein and Maynard around 415 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Highway 93 And County W 14, Donnan, Highway 93 And County V 68, Volga River State Park, Wadena, Randalia, Highways 3 And 187, County Road W 45 And 187, Westgate and County Road W 33 And 187. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
